metadata.title: CVE-2024-6287 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect Calculation vulnerability in Renesas arm-trusted-firmware allowsLocal Execution of Code. When checking whether a new image invades/overlapswith a previously loaded image the code neglects to consider a few cases.that could An attacker to bypass memory range restriction and overwrite analready loaded image partly or completely, which could result in codeexecution and bypass of secure boot.

criterions.comment: arm-trusted-firmware package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
